featured.text: The jewel of the architecture is the 22-domed Transfiguration Church, built in the early 1700s.

definition.zh_def: 圓頂，通常是建築物的上部，呈半球形或類似形狀。
definition.en_def: A rounded vault forming the roof of a building or structure.
definition.example: The cathedral features a magnificent dome that can be seen from miles away.
